summary: Iteration 15 - Tested Google OAuth removal, admin login, and user management features. All features working correctly - Google OAuth completely removed from login page, admin can login with seth.cushing@compassx.com / CompassX2026!, Settings page shows User Management section for admins only, all CRUD operations for users work correctly.
passed_tests: API: /api/health returns healthy status with database connected
API: Admin login POST /api/auth/login works with seth.cushing@compassx.com / CompassX2026!
API: Login rejects wrong password with 401
API: Login rejects non-existent user with 401
API: GET /api/auth/users returns all users for admin
API: POST /api/auth/users creates new user (admin only)
API: POST /api/auth/users rejects duplicate email with 400
API: POST /api/auth/users rejects password < 8 chars with 400
API: POST /api/auth/users rejects invalid role with 400
API: PUT /api/auth/users/{id} updates user (admin only)
API: POST /api/auth/users/{id}/reset-password resets password (admin only)
API: DELETE /api/auth/users/{id} deletes user (admin only)
API: Admin cannot delete themselves with 400
API: Non-admin user gets 403 on create user
API: Non-admin user gets 403 on update user
API: Non-admin user gets 403 on delete user
API: Non-admin user gets 403 on reset password
UI: Login page has NO Google OAuth button
UI: Login page has email input, password input, Sign In button
UI: Admin login navigates to dashboard after success
UI: Settings page shows User Management section for admin users
UI: Settings page has Add User button for admins
UI: Add User dialog has Name, Email, Password, Role fields
UI: User created successfully toast appears after creation
UI: User list shows all users with role badges
UI: Each user row has Edit, Reset Password, Delete action buttons
UI: Admin's own row shows 'You' badge and no action buttons
UI: Edit User dialog opens with correct user data
UI: Delete User confirmation dialog shows warning message
UI: Non-admin users do NOT see User Management section
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 15 verified: 1) Google OAuth completely removed from Login page - only email/password login form present. 2) Admin login works with seth.cushing@compassx.com / CompassX2026!. 3) Settings page shows 'User Management' section ONLY for admin users. 4) User Management section has: Add User button, list of all users, each user row has edit/reset-password/delete action buttons. 5) Admin's own row shows 'You' badge and no action buttons (cannot delete self). 6) Non-admin users (e.g., brian.clements@compassx.com) only see Profile and Change Password sections - no User Management. 7) All API endpoints for user management require admin role (403 for non-admins).

verified_features.google_oauth_removed: Verified - Login page has NO Google OAuth button
verified_features.admin_login: Working - seth.cushing@compassx.com / CompassX2026! logs in successfully
verified_features.user_management_admin_only: Working - Only admins see User Management section
verified_features.create_user: Working - Admin can create users via Add User button
verified_features.edit_user: Working - Admin can edit user name, email, role
verified_features.reset_password: Working - Admin can reset user passwords
verified_features.delete_user: Working - Admin can delete users with confirmation
verified_features.self_delete_prevention: Working - Admin cannot delete their own account
verified_features.non_admin_access_denied: Working - Non-admin users get 403 on all user management endpoints
